sentences.en: an overpowering stench of rotting fish
Conflict between theory and observation becomes overpowering.
sentences.cn: 理论同观测的矛盾变得不可调和.

sentences.en: He had felt the same overpowering relief then that he felt now.
sentences.cn: 他现在所感到的轻松之感也就是当年从火线上撤下来时的压倒一切的轻松之感.

sentences.en: His lust for her grew until it was overpowering.
sentences.cn: 他企图在肉体上占有她的欲望变得一发不可收拾。

sentences.en: The air was filled with the overpowering stench of decomposing vegetation.
sentences.cn: 空气中充满了令人难以忍受的腐烂植物的恶臭.

sentences.en: The desire for revenge can be overpowering.
sentences.cn: 报复的欲望有时会压倒一切。

sentences.en: The feeling of inadequacy was overpowering.
sentences.cn: 无法胜任的感觉非常强烈。
噪音吵得人什么都听不清。

sentences.en: The overpowering despair that he'd fought so hard to keep at bay washed through the boy.
sentences.cn: 一直极力压制的绝望情绪终于将男孩击垮了。

sentences.en: The stench of burning rubber was overpowering.
The window was closed and the stink was overpowering.
sentences.cn: 窗户关得严严的,房间里臭气熏天.

sentences.en: There was an overpowering smell of alcohol.
There was an overpowering smell of burning tyres.
sentences.cn: 有一股浓烈的烧轮胎的气味.

trans.tran_cn: 压倒性（优势）的，无法抵抗的，极强大的，制止不了的
trans.tran_en: An overpowering smell or sound is so strong that you cannot smell or hear anything else

trans.tran_cn: overpower的现在分词，击败，（感情等）压倒，使无法忍受
